video.title: Man v. Food Collection
video.synopsis: Host Adam Richman goes on a mouthwatering journey to find America's greatest pig-out spots and take on the country's most legendary eating challenges.

episodes.synopsis: Adam's visits Memphis, Tenn., home to deep-fried Southern cooking and pork barbecue fare. Spots visited include Gus's World Famous Fried Chicken.
episodes.title: Memphis

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman travels to Columbus, Ohio, to indulge in sausages and burgers. Can he take down a 2-1/2-pound Dagwood sandwich at an Ohio deli?
episodes.title: Columbus

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman visits Austin, Texas, for humongous Round Rock donuts and a near-impossible breakfast taco showdown: the Don Juan El Taco Grande.
episodes.title: Austin

episodes.synopsis: In the Windy City, Adam Richman gets his chow on with Italian beef sandwiches and legendary deep-dish Chicago-style pizza.
episodes.title: Chicago

episodes.synopsis: Adam travels to Pittsburgh, Pa., for a breakfast at Deluca's, a sandwich at Primanti Brothers and an Atomic Hot Wings battle at Quaker Steak & Lube.
episodes.title: Pittsburgh

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman tries the Eagles Deli Challenge: a 10-patty burger with 20 slices of cheese, 20 pieces of bacon, 5 pounds of fries and a giant pickle.
episodes.title: Boston

episodes.synopsis: In New York, Adam takes on 1-pound sandwiches at Katz's Delicatessen, soul food at Sylvia's Restaurant and hot curry dishes at Brick Lane Curry House.
episodes.title: New York

episodes.synopsis: Adam heads to New Orleans, chomping on huge po'boys at Mother's Restaurant, and nearly 200 oysters in the Acme Oyster House Challenge.
episodes.title: New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Adam meets a new challenge: a huge omelet stuffed with chili, salsa, sour cream and cheddar cheese -- all weighing in at five pounds.
episodes.title: Seattle

episodes.synopsis: Adam is in Los Angeles, feasting on french dip, roasted pork tortillas and a hot ramen made with nearly a dozen different chilies.
episodes.title: Los Angeles

episodes.synopsis: Adam visits the Mile-High City for a showdown with Jack-N-Grill's mountainous burrito: seven potatoes, a pound of ham, a dozen eggs and a whole onion.
episodes.title: Denver

episodes.synopsis: Adam hits up Minneapolis, Minn., where he visits Matt's Bar, 5-8 Club and Gasthof zur Gemutlichkeit to take on the Meterbratwurst Challenge.
episodes.title: Minneapolis

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman is in Las Vegas for huge breakfasts, some of the hottest crawfish in the country and a massive challenge known as the Big Badass Burrito.
episodes.title: Las Vegas

episodes.synopsis: Adam travels to Charleston for oysters served by the shovel, a fried chicken sandwich smothered in sausage gravy and a spicy tuna sushi challenge.
episodes.title: Charleston

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman visits Alaska for a mountainous breakfast and a monstrous challenge: the six-pound Kodiak Arrest at Humpy's Alaskan Alehouse.
episodes.title: Alaska

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman devours a Mission Style Super Burrito, ginormous sandwiches and a 2-gallon monster sundae known as the Kitchen Sink in San Francisco.
episodes.title: San Francisco

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman visits three baseball stadiums known for serving up the most delicious and unique ballpark grub in the country.
episodes.title: Baseball Special

episodes.synopsis: Adam Richman visits Little Rock, Ark., for the Quadruple Hubcap Burger, a huge community barbecue and the Shut Up Juice spicy pulled-pork challenge.
episodes.title: Little Rock

episodes.synopsis: Adam takes on the nation's capital and attempts to devour a 6-pound milkshake and a 1.5-pound sandwich.
episodes.title: Washington, D.C

episodes.synopsis: Adam returns to Brooklyn, N.Y., for Brooklyn's best Sicilian-style pie and a grudge match against some of the Empire State's spiciest wings.
episodes.title: Brooklyn

episodes.synopsis: Adam journeys to Salt Lake City, Utah, for a pastrami-topped cheeseburger, a Belgian sausage sandwich and the Hellfire Challenge at Kobe Sushi.
episodes.title: Salt Lake City

episodes.synopsis: Adam heads to Kansas City, Mo. for pulled pork and smoked brisket, fried chicken at Stroud's and the Ultimate Destroyer Challenge.
episodes.title: Kansas City

episodes.synopsis: Adam's at the famous Jersey Shore to try Trenton style tomato pie plus an octopus shaped ice cream sundae and the spicy Ludicrous Wings Challenge.
episodes.title: Jersey Shore

episodes.synopsis: Adam is in Des Moines, Iowa, for some Midwestern comfort food, unique sandwich-inspired pizza and the five-pound Adam Emmenecker sandwich challenge.
episodes.title: Des Moines

episodes.synopsis: Adam heads to Ann Arbor, Michigan, The trip ends in a showdown as Adam tackles the Mount Nacheesmo challenge at Tio's Mexican Café.
episodes.title: Ann Arbor
